name: Total War: Rome II - Wrath of Sparta
name_original: Total War: Rome II - Wrath of Sparta
description:
Total War: Rome II - Wrath of Sparta is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2014. SEGA published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Total War: Rome II - Wrath of Sparta on PC.
